Reviews.Title: “Small Inn, Perfect Staff, great location!”
Reviews.Author: robphys
Reviews.Content: hotel please dont expect unmanned inn ie bathroom staff residence day night happy stay leonardo express train 14 euros takes 32 minutes inn easy walk left train station zebra crossing walk towards church santa maria maggiore stood front church streets street walk look closely doors pass merulana 3rd floor met judy brilliant extremely helpful spent day ringing airport trying missing luggage local travel advice restaurants town etc breakfast basic buffet continental breakfast bacon scrambled eggs thats clean throughout cleaned daily location reasonably fit active 10 minute walk colosseum walked vatican center rome located 10 minutes termini train tram bus station 40 express taking straight vatican bus tours leave santa maria maggiore 15 minutes enable hop major attractions inn 31st december 2011 spent 4 nights absolutely issues inc wifi recommend negatives people nooks crannies city hustle bustle positive

Reviews.Content: wonderful guest house perfectly situated appartment 6 bedrooms 3rd floor lift easy walking distance locations judy helpful advice buses metros etc staff pleasant breakfasts type accommodation immaculate quiet valued independence afforded swipe keys entry etc patricia sisters yorkshire

Reviews.Content: spent nights italy vacation romes merulana inn loved hotel perfect introduction italian hospitality judy team wonderful merulana inn actually bed breakfast located third floor residential apartment building stayed inn discreetly located signs flashy neon lighting street name double door buildings sign posted door buzzer name inn beautiful comfortable bed loaded updated features including refrigerator air conditioner remotecontrolled door shutters roll cover terrace doors night yes terrace outside bathroom equally impressive featured modern equipment including bathtub shower toilet bidet bathroom door led terrace manual delightful breakfast italian meats cheeses breads croissants served dining morning stay staff prepared coffee scrambled eggs cheese ham feature free wireless internet service dependable nice modern touch key card holder inside key cards activate electricity owners control energy card leave day electricity shuts own stayed lights electrical devices timers merulana inn located walking distance 10 mins roma termini train station arriving rome plane probably leonardo express train main airport termini backpack rolling suitcase able walk inn cafes gelato grocery stores pharmacies immediate course churches value rome roma pass pass access citys metro system days museums archaeological sites 2 free visit colosseo foro romano coliseum forum galleria borghese pass costs 25 euros purchase online pick arrive rome cant wait visit rome stay merulana inn recommend planning visit eternal city

Reviews.Title: “Modern, chic & clean”
Reviews.Author: Mel_Peak
Reviews.Content: merulana inn excellent location price paid 10 minute walk colosseum forum approx 45 min walk city vatican modern clean staff helpful accomodating staff spoke italian real language barrier overcame demonstrating ie doors pass information english etc provided a3 size map city detailing tourist attractions navigating rome extremely easy pc internet access guests allowed checking metro routes bus times easy found closely located cleaned day standard breakfast available 8 10am wasnt varied liked food appeal tastes cereal toast yoghurts pastries meat slices happily stay opportunity arises revisit rome

Reviews.Title: “Great rooms, good location, excellent staff.”

Reviews.Content: beds comfortable clean found warm tend windows temperature low location convenient close termini easy walk access major sights metro station vatican decent breakfast included coffee improved cleaned day fresh towels readily supplied encountered staff cover required roles extremely friendly helpful attentive difficulties accessing hotel follow guidelines simple size hotel means noise slight morning dining water night morning dealt didnt pose happily recommend hotel

Reviews.Content: warning staying cut story short agreed leave luggage till 300pm rung visiting vatican pick 230pm answered phoned emergency eventually ignored bell appeared pay extra storing luggage leave miss train dread happened flight missed believe hotel uncaring attitude towards guests fire escapes surprised legal

Reviews.Title: “Quirky but Cool”
Reviews.Author: Ami_Jai_Patel
Reviews.Content: husband stayed 2 nights wasnt obvious wasnt sign address building spot cant fault merulana inn quirky little 7 single floor office block 24hour reception pester information isnt keeping 5 lack proper reception meeting facilities dont nice clean modern deco 32 samsung lcd location 2 minute walk nearest underground station 5 minute walk termini free wifi id definitely stay recommend person reception understand speak little english shame mention anniversary trip husband birthday effort special

Reviews.Title: “Excellent accomodation in Rome - close to everything!”

Reviews.Content: stayed total 3 nights 12 night tour italy pleased accomodations service received excellent price location cheaper nicer clean tidy nicely decorated toiletries provided fresh towels day stayed 4 balcony wonderful view piazza street didnt safe extra charge breakfast served day sunday hot breakfast including scrambled eggs hotels serve equivalent continental breakfast staff accomodating arrived earlier checkin held bags walk city ready computer access common convenient emails additional travel etc free charge traveling person suggest getting keys required electricity husband run quick errand left power returned night stay italy simply additional key drawback hotel minimal 3rd floor residential building elevator carry bags stairs travelers physical limitations issue residential building buzzed front door staff inn 830am 2 3pm arrive buzz webcam contact affiliate hotel location buzz building inn times arrived staff onsite didnt excellent hotel perfect location 10 min walk colosseum 20 25 min walk spanish steps taxi vatican cost 15 euros merulana 5 blocks termini station easily walked suitcases tow easy navigate map recommend looking nice hotel reasonable price prime location site seeing rome
